answers.answer: If you dont mind me asking what exactly is pre eclampsia?

Pre eclampsia is when you start developing high blood pressure and protein in the urine,  if severe it can harm the baby's growth. But I haven't develop high blood pressure I just had a bit of protein in my urine.  And my baby is growing as normal.

I had this happen with first. And yes she was healthy just a little small 5lbs and 12 oz but left the hospital when I did, latched and breastfed great became a very chunky baby lol, just be prepared you might need preemie clothes.
Thank you very much,  I'm glad to hear that she did fine. Yes I need to buy some small outfits, because the smallest I have for him so far, are 0-3 sizes...
My son wore newborn size for 4 1/2 weeks. He was born 6 lbs 15 oz

Ok so I'm I was told I might have this on Monday I'm 26 weeks nd having tested begin done on the 28 I was winderring wen u found out u had this is it bad to find out this early nd way were it symptoms
I'll be having my c section at 37 weeks for mild preeclampsia too!

I found out when I was 34 weeks, because I had for once my blood pressure 140/80 so the Dr prescribe me an urine collection of 24 hrs and there's when it showed the protein in my urine,  and since that day he just told me he was going ti induce me at 37 even thou the baby was fine, what happens with pre eclampsia is that it could go from mild ti severe

And when its severe it can harm the baby and the mom.  So far my baby still doing fine,  the dr also sent me a nonstresst test twice a week that to monitor the babys movement so far he is super hyper lol...  when they did my 35 weeks ultrasound my baby weighted 6lbs 12 oz.
Mom_520 the dr will tell you to monitor your blood pressure at home for the rest of the pregnancy
Kelllyxoxo why are you having a c-section? Is thus your first one too?

I'm having a c section bc  this is my second time getting preclampsia I had it with my first pregnancy also and was induced but I didn't progress so I went in for an emergency c section. This is a repeat
Oh, good luck, I wish you the best, and how many weeks do you have? My induction is next Thursday,  I'm freaking out. Time goes by so fast...
I'm only 26 weeks right now. Due date was January 18th now it's December 28th lol
Wow, almost for new year... but it will be fine. 11 more weeks to meet your baby.
I had my daughter at 37 weeks naturaly she was just ready to come out she was born 7.10 lbs and 19 in long she was perfectly fine dont wrry put everything in gods hands
Thank you ana, I will put it in his hands. So far I'll be natural too...

question: Hey girls,  is my first time posting, I'm a FTM, I'm 35.6 weeks and I'm being induce at 37 weeks, because of mild pre eclampsia.... For now everything is going super good but my dr, says he doesn't want to risk it, has any one gone through this,  any experience you could share,  was the baby healthy after the birth? Thank you..
title: induce at 37 weeks...
